options.3: I don't feel well, but I know why I feel like that...

dialogue_2.text: Good too, but I'm so hungry, my stomach is growling loudly now! I wanna eat!

options.4: Oh, you must be really hungry, don't worry, I will give you something to eat
options.5: Oh, I'm sorry, I don't have something to eat now, you'll have to search something to eat in the forest, maybe you'll find something delicious there.
